title: Live
subtitle: Real-time photography and videography
description: This smart studio system of 8m2 allows you to make your photos and videos of live models or scenographies in a few minutes. In an instant, your productions are self-edited, formatted, turnkey for e-commerce, Instagram, Snapchat or Facebook. Gain in efficiency to be first on your market.

services: For an optimal rendering, the E-Do team can take care of the retouching of your visuals
We can take care of the entire shoot for your products
